option.label: Sgt. Pistol (12", A1), Sgt. Hand Weapon (A2)
Flamer (12", A1, Blast(3), Reliable), Combat Drill (A2, AP(1), Rending)

specialRules.name: Piper's Calling
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units that are within 12 at the beginning of the round get Furious. If they already had Furious, they get extra hits on unmodified rolls of 5-6 instead. This effect lasts until the end of the round.

specialRules.name: Heavy Pierce
specialRules.description: Whenever this model attacks in melee, roll one die. On a 6+ the target takes 3 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per activation, if within 2 of a model with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may remove D3 wounds from that model.

specialRules.name: Lead from Behind
specialRules.description: Whenever a friendly unit within 12" fails a morale test, it takes one wound, and up to 3 friendly units within 12" of it automatically pass all morale tests until the end of the round.

specialRules.name: Scurry Away
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 3 other friendly units within 12, which may move by up to 6".

specialRules.name: Safety in Numbers
specialRules.description: Once per activation, pick 2 friendly units within 12. Those units, and up to 3 friendly units within 6" get +1 to their next morale test roll.
